definition: to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail

sentences.english: At a high speed, a car is more stable if it uses slightly wider rims.
sentences.chinese: 在高速行駛時，汽車是如果它使用更穩定略寬框。

sentences.english: In England people drive on the left.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，人們開車靠左行駛。

sentences.english: It takes just 25 minutes to make the 75-mile trip.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅25分鐘，車就行駛75英里。

sentences.english: Added an option to turn off smoke and dust off the tank tracks.
sentences.chinese: 增加了可以關閉坦克行駛時的煙霧和揚塵的選項。

sentences.english: It rolled on top of a sonorous vault.
sentences.chinese: 它在天頂上轟隆隆地行駛。

sentences.english: The old bus bumped along the mountain road.
sentences.chinese: 舊公共汽車沿著山路顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: Our car bowled along the smooth country roads.
sentences.chinese: 我們的汽車在平坦的鄉間道路上很快地行駛。

sentences.english: Charges of political chicanery were brought against him.
sentences.chinese: 他被指控行駛政治欺騙手段。

sentences.english: Traffic encircles the Angel of Independence monument on Mexico City’s Paseo de la Reforma.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城改革大道，車輛環繞獨立天使紀念碑行駛。

sentences.english: The boat wallowed helplessly in the stormy sea.
sentences.chinese: 大海中無力地顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: A motor vehicle which reaches the standards for being discarded as unserviceable shall not run on road.
sentences.chinese: 達到報廢標準的機動車不得上道路行駛。

sentences.english: The leaves of the trees left, the car in the snow in slowly moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 樹上的葉子所剩無幾，汽車在雪地中緩慢地行駛着。

sentences.english: The cable car 's first run started at the top of a307- foot hill.
sentences.chinese: 纜車一開始是從307尺高的坡道上往下行駛。

sentences.english: The lorry was travelling at 20mph in the slow lane.
sentences.chinese: 卡車在慢車道上以20英里的時速行駛。

sentences.english: Incremental encoders without bearings for drives with large axial play or high speeds.
sentences.chinese: 無軸承的驅動器增量式編碼器與大型軸向或高速行駛。

definition: to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
